generative_rules.layout: Single column, centered text, plenty of spacing.
generative_rules.typography: Serif fonts for headers, Italic for descriptions.

header.instruction: Bold, colorful header block with curve.

generative_rules.layout: 2-Column grid or box-based layout for items.

generative_rules.layout: Simple list with dotted lines connecting item to price.
